title: Project for the supply, installation, testing and commissioning of 02 Nos. Cardiac Catheterization systems and 02 Nos. Echo Cardiography Machines to the Cardiology Department of the National Hospital of Sri Lanka
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health to award the above contract to a company in Austria, on the recommendations of the Cabinet Appointed Negotiating Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
